title: I asked Amazon to show me weird tech gadgets. I still haven't recovered
description: Sometimes, a simple quest can turn into so much more. Or less.

title: Rode Procaster review: Broadcast-quality microphone for under $200
description: Rode's Procaster microphone is built like a tank and provides excellent audio for new podcasters or video content creators.

title: He refused to keep his webcam on, so the company fired him
description: Is management really about being able to constantly watch over your employees? A court suggests it isn't.

title: Taco Bell just tried to excite customers with a new kind of drive-thru
description: Is all new technology truly good for the fast-food business? Maybe.

title: The 4 best cheap Windows laptops of 2022
description: If you're looking for a cheap Windows laptop, you don't have to skimp out on features like display, battery life, processor, or storage to find a great pick for less.

title: The 5 best waterproof phone pouches of 2022
description: When you buy the right waterproof phone pouch, there are no longer any worries about water ruining your phone. Before you go swimming, you need the best waterproof phone pouch to protect your cell phone, which is where we come in with our best picks.
